yaml_migration.title: YAML-based configuration detected, manual migration required
yaml_migration.description: Your integration is configured via YAML. The integration no longer supports configuring via YAML. You will only be able to configure the integration via the UI and we recommend removing any configurations from `configuration.yaml`. To learn more, please click 'Learn More'.

error.missing_credentials: This cluster requires authentication. Please provide a username and password.
error.untrusted_connection: Elasticsearch's server certificate could not be verified. Either disable TLS verification, or specify a custom CA path below.
error.unsupported_version: Unsupported version of Elasticsearch detected. The minimum supported version is 7.11.0.

data.ssl_ca_path: Fully qualified path to custom certificate authority
Fully qualified path to custom certificate authority
Fully qualified path to custom certificate authority

abort.configured_via_yaml: Configuration imported from configuration.yaml. Remove entry from configuration.yaml, restart, and re-add this integration to proceed.

data.publish_frequency: Publish events to Elasticsearch at this interval
data.polling_frequency: Gather all entity states at this interval
data.change_detection_enabled: Detect and publish changes to entities
data.change_detection_type: Choose what types of entity changes to listen for and publish
data.excluded_domains: Domains to exclude from publishing. Defaults to none.
data.excluded_entities: Entities to exclude from publishing. Defaults to none.
data.included_domains: Domains to publish. Defaults to all domains.
data.included_entities: Entities to publish. Defaults to all entities.
